articles.title: Melioidosis: CDC says 4 infected, 2 dead in US from rare tropical disease - FOX 5 Atlanta
articles.description: U.S. health officials are investigating the latest fatal case of a rare tropical disease typically found in South Asia.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - U.S. health officials are investigating the latest fatal case of a rare tropical disease typically found in South Asia.
